Interface tripleplay.sound.Playable

Changed Methods
boolean isPlaying() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns true if this playable is currently playing, false otherwise.
void play() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Starts this clip or loop playing.
void release() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Releases this playable when it is no longer needed.
void setVolume(float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Configures the volume for this clip to a value between 0 and 1.
void stop() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Stops this clip or loop (fading it out over one second).
float volume() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the current volume configured for this clip.
